alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Grant; Owen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF GRANT, CENTRAL OWEN AND CENTRAL GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Owenton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Williamstown, Dry Ridge, Owenton, Glencoe, Sparta, Munk, Stewartsville, Elk Lake, Cherry Grove, Long Ridge, Eagle Hill, New Liberty, Napoleon, Twin Bridges, Needmore, Holbrook, Lawrenceville and Elliston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
